items.sentence: Do you remember the first time we went to Boston together?
I think it\'s time for me to give up on this relationship.
I think it\'s unhealthy to eat more than 20 oranges a day.
I think that Tom doesn\'t know that Mary can speak French.
I think that it was strange that Tom didn\'t say anything.
I think there\'s a good possibility that that will happen.
I became very nervous when I couldn\'t locate my passport.
I can think of a lot of reasons why we shouldn\'t do that.
I can\'t imagine what my life would be like without music.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who taught you French.
